articles.title: How Brazil missed its chance to secure Covid-19 vaccines
articles.description: Only about one million doses of the coronavirus vaccine have been administered in Brazil -- a stunningly low number given Brazil's decades-long success in vaccinating its population. CNN's Matt Rivers reports.
